about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Offensive Security Specialist
about.paragraph1: I am a cybersecurity professional specialized in penetration testing and security audits. My approach combines structured methodologies with creative thinking to identify vulnerabilities that others might overlook.
about.paragraph2: I have worked with companies across various sectors, from tech startups to financial corporations, helping them strengthen their defenses through proactive identification of weaknesses in their systems.
about.paragraph3: My philosophy is based on the principle that to defend effectively, one must first understand how to attack. That's why I constantly stay updated with the latest exploitation techniques and attack vectors.

skill1.title: Advanced Pentesting
skill1.description: Web, mobile and network penetration testing. Vulnerability analysis and system exploitation. Reverse engineering and malware analysis.

skill2.title: Security Tools
skill2.description: Proficiency in Metasploit, Burp Suite, Nmap, Wireshark and testing tools. Development of custom scripts for audits.

skill3.title: Secure Development
skill3.description: Source code review, application and API analysis. Knowledge of OWASP Top 10 and secure development practices.

skill4.title: Network Security
skill4.description: Network architecture analysis, intrusion detection, firewall and prevention systems. System and network hardening.

skill5.title: Social Engineering
skill5.description: Awareness testing, phishing simulations and evaluation of human resistance in organizations.

skill6.title: Cloud Security
skill6.description: AWS, Azure and GCP environment auditing. Implementation of security policies and cloud best practices.
